docs.text: Blogging Business Documentation for J & JJ Landscape  Project documentation uses Markdown. Overview  This documentation will be a resource for any J&JJ Landscaping employee wishing to perform any function on the Blogging Platform. This site documents the goals and reasoning behind implementing a blogging platform and how to succeful operate the site for achieving the best results for J&JJ Landscaping. Blog Goals  More Traffic More Leads More Sales Strategies  Have over 311 Indexed Pages in Google Study Shows that having over 311+ indexed pages drives Median Monthly Leads by Triple Compared to the 176-310 Indexed Pages Grouping Post Regularly (Choose weekly or Bi-weekly) Add Social Share Buttons (Choose which social media sites to share to) Keyword Research on Each Blog Post Schedule Content to post Automatically Have a back log of content (weeks to a year) Tools  The Heming Way Online Editor http://www.hemingwayapp.com/ The Grammerly Online Editor https://www.grammarly.com/grammar-check Use this tool to analyze your headline: CoSchedule.com/headline-analyzer Answerthepublic.com Keywordseverywhere.com Chrome Extension Keyword planner BuzzSome.com

docs.text: Writing a Post for J&JJ Landscaping Blog  Not simply just writing a Blog Post. It is distribution of creative high quality content that is than strategically spread out to every digital media J&JJ occupies. Categories of Content  Evergreen content  Gudies and How-tos Questions and answers Topical aritcles Defintions and explanations Socail-viral content  Quizzes Lists Product stories Link building content  Infographics Unique tools & resources Guest posts Lead generation content  Whitepapers Ebooks Research studies What makes a good blog post?  Do Not:  No call to action No catchy headlines No images Do:  Catchy Attractive Headline (question, top 5, etc) Catchy Picture Introdction that hooks Main body that addresses the thesis Clean Conclusion Call To Action (Contact Us, Comment Below, Share your Story, Deal or offer) Contact us Comment Below Share your story Deal or Offer Sharing options Social Media Related Posts Comments Coming Up With The Idea --- What topic should you write about?  SEO brief  Look at competitors  Checkout their most popular content Identify gaps Read comments for insights Google & Keywords  Google Search Answerthepublic.com Keywordseverywhere.com Chrome Extension Keyword planner BuzzSome.com Write what you know  Use a tool  Software analytics has come a long way and some of the software is free. Answer The Public is an amazing tool that generates 100's of ideas to choose from. Check Out the decision tree/flow charts the site produces: How to Write Your Headline  Spend Time on This Let Keywords Guide You  The How-to headline  The list headline  5 Ways to improve your guard in less than an hour The top three budget saving tips for your next landscaping project 10 Ways to get The most out of your ... Check Your Headline Tool  Use this tool to analyze your headline: CoSchedule.com/headline-analyzer Call To Action  How To Distribute Content  Pay someone else  Writing The Article  Pay someone else  Use Keywords  Tools to help your Writing and Editing :  The Heming Way Online Editor http://www.hemingwayapp.com/ The Grammerly Online Editor https://www.grammarly.com/grammar-check
